recipesJson.name: 'Nilla Custard (Touch of Vanilla Bourbon)
recipesJson.author: BradH
recipesJson.description: I LOVE custard vapes. I've looked at so many different recipes. I'm new to mixing, but I had to try my hand at it. More than willing to take constructive criticism. Mix it up and let me know what you think!!!

reviews.text: Solid vanilla custard. I like how you didn't completely rely on cap's VC. Maybe remove bourbon from the title because people might expect more of a whiskey flavor in the custard.
